Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.weapons

Class MacroEffect

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.weapons.MacroEffect
  • public class MacroEffect
extends java.lang.Object
    each weapon have 2 or 3 macroeffects that are the effects of the weapons. each macroeffect have up to 3 microeffects
